rooms.description: The entrance hall includes a reception area with natural light from overhead skylight.
An open space adjacent to the kitchen for social gatherings, incorporating ample windows on Mediterranean style wooden shutters.
A dining area with a view towards the garden and integrated within the living room layout.
Functional Mediterranean kitchen featuring open shelving, ventilation hood, and access to a small patio.
A compact guest bathroom designed for efficiency with local building norms in mind.
A quiet study area with built-in bookshelves, natural lighting from large windows and a Vastu-aligned south-east corner placement.
Compact living quarters for household help with basic amenities, placed on the periphery to maintain privacy.

openings.description: Large casement windows in key areas such as the living room, library and entrance hall to ensure natural light and cross ventilation.
Mediterranean-style wooden door at the main entrance complemented by sidelights for enhanced security and aesthetic appeal.

rooms.description: A spacious master suite featuring an en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet, and a private balcony for fresh air.
Secondary bedroom with access to natural light through large windows, aligning with Vastu principles in the east direction.
Additional bedroom designed for privacy and comfort with south-west facing windows for balanced ventilation.
Spare bedroom that can serve as a home office or guest room, ensuring ample natural light via east-west orientation.
Bathroom attached to Bedroom 2 with essential fixtures and local building norms considered for water efficiency.

openings.description: Strategically placed windows ensuring natural light in each bedroom, aligning with Vastu's emphasis on air circulation.
Balcony door for direct access to the rooftop terrace area.

rooms.description: A spacious outdoor area designed as a multifunctional space with seating, greenery, and a pergola for shade. Adheres to Vastu principles by focusing on the north-west quadrant.

openings.description: Interior staircase from upper floor leading to the rooftop terrace with sound insulation and safety railings.
Large roof windows ensuring natural light for adjacent spaces, also serving as emergency exits in compliance with local building codes.
